price: Musa’ya emir verdiğimizde sen (Tur'un) batı yanında değildin ve sen (buna) şahit olanlardan da değildin.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta bijānibi al-gharbiyi idh qaḍaynā ilā mūsā al-amra wamā kunta mina al-shāhidīna
